name: C U B E S (DeepDownGames)
description: I started looking into Blitz3D, this is technically the second game I've made (I'm using tutorials as a guide), but I added a few things to it. It's a bit buggy every no-and-then being that you might have a rock spawn on your cube after collecting food. I'm not sure how to fix that yet, but I think it's a fun and simple game. I'm going to look into the 3D side of things now. Enjoy!
